jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern
jobs.desc:
Designed, developed, and deployed a fully documented AWS Lambda API to deliver cloud maturity metrics for all 30+ cloud infrastructure systems used at Capital One, to be adopted by over 11,000 software engineers organized in over 2,000 agile teams.
Collaborated with associate and senior engineers in a scrum-based agile environment, leveraging JIRA for issue tracking and sprint management, Python for software implementation, GraphQL for complex database queries, and Jenkins for seamless deployment.
Utilized the Pytest framework to implement and execute over 50 unit tests designed with both black-box and white-box testing methodologies to validate API functionality and robustness, providing over 90% statement coverage comprehensively.

jobs.title: System Administrator
jobs.desc:
Overseeing the operations of the Rensselaer Student Union's IT infrastructure, including Linux servers, Windows machines, and in-house solutions, enabling over 250 full-time and student employees.
Maintaining the Rensselaer Student Unionâ€™s club management system, utilized by over 200 various student groups and organizations.

jobs.title: Founder, Executive Director
jobs.desc:
Founded a 20+ member creative media collective, overseeing the end-to-end production of plot-driven photo and video projects, from concept development through final delivery.
Hosting and maintaining portfolio website designed utilizing Figma and built using HTML/CSS and Javascript, dynamically showcasing 20+ visual deliverables.
Directed 3 cross-functional project teams in integrating fashion, photography, videography, and audio design to craft emotionally resonant and argumentatively impactful media.
Managing all operational aspects, including brand identity development, team onboarding, project scheduling, and comprehensive documentation, ensuring cohesive workflow and creative consistency.
